Recently, I asked myself the question how I can cover larger horizontal distances. The result was a teleporter which can teleport me above and below.
The yellow teleporter is the basic element. One can teleport to it, but not away from it.
You can teleport with an Enderpearl. When they are energized with neon energy and the target is stabilized, you can use the ability without breaking the Enderpearl.
The green teleporter can only teleport you to the top, regardless of it being a normal, up, or down teleporter.
The red teleporter can only teleport away. The type of receiving teleporter does not matter.
However, I also noticed that multi-story buildings have both a possibility to move up and down.
If you use a Scrench to right-click on a double teleporter, it splits apart and the lower part travels down until it hits the ground. Like this, you can easily connect two teleporters again.
